name: Budget Spacefight
description:
Submission for the GMTK game jam 2019 with the theme "Only one".

In this game you have to pilot a spaceship and defend against other attacking spaceships. However, since you are on a strict budget you had just enough cash for only one crew member (a cute little robot), only one booster for maneuvering, only one blaster for attacking your enemies and only one shielder for defending from enemy lasers.
